summary.para: The IN6_ADDR structure specifies an IPv6 transport address.

remarks.para: All members of the IN6_ADDR structure must be specified in network-byte-order (big-endian).

summary.para: A union that contains the following different representations of the IPv6 transport address:
An array that contains 16 UCHAR-typed values.
An array that contains eight USHORT-typed values.
